item.title: Google Sign in LibGDX
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to integrated google sign in in LibGDX. I assume that you are familiar with LibGDX, cross platform gaming framework. I’ll explain how integrate Google Sign in iOS. This is based on MobiDevelop’s Google Sign-in Robopods. Pre-requisites It is assumed that you have: Created a LibGDX application using the standard gdx-setup wizard Get an OAuth client ID & URL scheme for your project from here Download 3rd party native framework for your iOS module, instruction here
